item.description:
Can't promise that we can all sit together but I'll do my best.  It's a large Meetup for a small bar.  You have to be in the bar area for the 1/2 price apps!

 

Joe’s legendary full-portion appetizers are half-price from 3:00 to 6:00 in the bar area.

 

Appetizers (cut price in 1/2)

thai chicken lettuce wraps
served chilled with oranges, sugar snap peas, carrots and crunchy peanuts, in a tangy sesame-ginger vinaigrette 8.99

rhode island calamari
a toss of arugula, oven-roasted tomatoes and banana peppers, over focaccia crostini with lemon-caper tartar sauce 10.99

buffalo-caribbean chicken tenders
hand-breaded and tossed with our addictive mango-buffalo barbeque sauce, served with pineapple-jalapeno salsa and blue cheese dip 8.99

forno baked chicken quesadilla
pulled chicken with mozzarella, pepper jack, caramelized onions, roasted peppers and chipotle sour cream, with pineapple-jalapeno salsa 9.50

stuffed quahogs
rhode island clams, blended with chourico, roasted onions and grilled corn, drizzled with tabasco aioli 7.50

asian chicken dumplings
joe’s take on potstickers, bursting with flavor, in a citrus soy sauce 6.99

house-made guacamole
with tomato, jalapeno, onion, lime and cilantro 6.99

vegetable spring rolls
rice wrappers filled with asparagus, basil, mint, cucumbers, carrots, rice noodles and cilantro pesto, chilled and served with peanut dipping sauce 7.99

ahi tuna wontons
japanese chili-spiced crispy wontons topped with rare-seared sesame crusted tuna, pickled ginger and wasabi aioli 11.99

vine ripe tomato and four cheese flatbread
with basil pesto, shredded and fresh mozzarella, asiago, romano cheeses 7.99

garlic shrimp flatbread
with roasted corn, grilled red onions and mozzarella, drizzled with tabasco aioli 9.99
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area of the restaurant

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Not your Average Joe's Half Price Happy Hour!
